entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
